Text: 1916x792 and 4+ GIGAbytes? WTF is wrong with you fucktards? No one wants this. Try 720x304 or 640x288, and keep it under 1GB. There's no visible difference between that and your crap--except the wasted 3.25 GB.

dude, don't browse high res section if you want low resolution version of it. There are plenty of 700mb version with the resolution.
